data.meta_description: "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" OTT release date has become a topic of curiosity for fans. The film is releasing at theatres on Friday.
data.text:
Synopsis

"Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" OTT release date has become a topic of curiosity for fans. The film is releasing at theatres on Friday.

"Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" is releasing at theaters across the US on Friday, May 10. Cinephiles are curious to know when will the movie start streaming on OTT platforms.

It looks like fans of Planet of the Apes will have to wait longer to watch the latest film from the franchise. Even though it is not official but "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" will have digital premier on Hulu/Hulu on Disney+, rather than other OTT streaming platforms, as per a report on IGN.

First of all, previous nine films, including the first release in 1968, are available on Hulu. Secondly, film's distributor 20th Century Fox's three latest movies -- "The Creator", "A Haunting in Venice", and "The Boogeyman" -- were released on Hulu OTT streaming platform.

'Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes' OTT Release Date

"Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" is likely to have a OTT release window towards the latter part of the year, with a tentative date indicating mid-September. However, makers are yet to confirm the OTT release date of "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes".

Meanwhile, previous nine "Planet of the Apes" films are available on Hulu. These are "Planet of the Apes", "Beneath the Planet of the Apes", "Escape from the Planet of the Apes", "Conquest for the Planet of the Apes", "Battle for the Planet of the Apes", Tim Burton’s "Planet of the Apes", "Rise of the Planet of the Apes", "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes", and "War for the Planet of the Apes".

'Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes' Plot

Disney’s 20th Century Fox film, directed by Wes Ball, serves as the franchise’s 10th film in total and the fourth installment of the “Planet of the Apes” reboot films.

It takes place 300 years after “War for the Planet of the Apes” and follows young chimp Noa as he tries to protect his clan from a corrupt monarch named Proximus Caesar, who warps the teachings of the original Caesar.

Noa befriends Mae and an orangutan named Raka as they work together to shape the destinies of both apes and humans.

FAQs:

Q1. When is "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" releasing?

A1. "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" is releasing in theaters across the US on Friday, May 10.

Q2. Where can I watch "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes"?

A2. Right now, the only way to watch the "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" is to visit nearest theatres.
